display.title: Armor Keyword - Return
display.description: Rename a Spell Charm with the Keyword and combine it with any Armor Piece, a stack of World Fragment (Enchantment) & Shard of Power in a Enchanter's Crucible [Required: 1x Renamed Spell Charm 1x Any Armor Piece 64x World Fragment (Enchantment) 1x Shard of Power | Drop Craft With: Enchanter's Crucible]
